settings.title: Your Cosmetics Haven.
settings.question_1: Q: What is the shipping policy at Starway.com.pk?
settings.answer_1: We are thrilled to offer free shipping on all orders within Pakistan. Your beauty essentials will be delivered to your doorstep within 3-5 days. Our dedicated team ensures swift delivery, allowing you to enjoy your new purchases without any delay.
settings.question_2: Q: How can I track my order?
settings.answer_2: Once your order is confirmed, you will receive a tracking number via email. Use this number to track your package in real-time and stay informed about its journey to you.
settings.question_3: Q: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
settings.answer_3: Unfortunately, we cannot modify the shipping address once an order is placed. Please double-check your details before confirming your purchase.
settings.question_4: Q: What is the return or refund policy at Starway.com.pk?
settings.answer_4: We understand that preferences can change. You can return or request a refund for your purchase within 14 days of receiving the order. Please refer to our Returns & Refunds page for detailed instructions on the process.
settings.question_5: Q: How do I initiate a return or refund?
settings.answer_5: To initiate a return or refund, visit our Returns & Refunds page on the website. Follow the provided instructions, and our customer support team will guide you through the process.
settings.question_6: Q: Are there any conditions for returns or refunds?
settings.answer_6: Items must be unused, in their original packaging, and accompanied by proof of purchase for a successful return or refund. Please review our Returns & Refunds policy for more details.
settings.question_7: Q: How long does it take to process returns or refunds?
settings.answer_7: We aim to process returns and refunds promptly. Once we receive your returned items, please allow 5-7 business days for the processing to be completed.
settings.question_8: Q: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer_8: Currently, Starway.com.pk only ships within Pakistan. We hope to expand our shipping capabilities to other regions in the future.
settings.question_9: Q: How can I contact customer support?
settings.answer_9: For any inquiries or assistance, please reach out to our customer support team at Here. We are here to help make your shopping experience enjoyable and hassle-free.
